Athentication

API Integration Instructions
1.ClearBlade User Token API
URL: https://ingrammicro.clearblade.com/api/v/1/user/auth
Headers: 
      {
       "ClearBlade-SystemKey":"given system key",
       "ClearBlade-SystemSecret":"given system secret"
          }
Method: Post
Body: 
  
                  { 
                  "username":" clearblade username ",
                  "password":"clearblade password "
                  }
SampleResponse: 
{
  "user_token":"S7jB5AIO925E7chMweEsVisNDsJ3kuIsAYCO27ryR9uWvYTxWJVkqOg5VxcAj_2j720y7UxlJhFJOl2dGQ==",
  "user_id":"9effcbbd0beaf1a2fb84e8e7ac14"
  }
2.GatewayList API
URL: https://ingrammicro.clearblade.com/api/v/1/code/bacb8fb60bb4d7c2c2b1c0e4bb9701/GatewayList
Headers: 
{ "ClearBlade-UserToken":"Response 'user-token' from 'ClearBlade User Token API' which specified above"}
Method: Post
Body: 
  
                  { 
                  "networkUUID": "Given networkUUID"
                  }
SampleResponse: 
   {
  "results": {
    "Method": "GatewayList",
    "Result": [
      {
        "BatteryLevel": "",
        "ClientName": "ingram",
        "ConfiguredSensors": 2,
        "GatewayID": 913201,
        "GatewayName": "",
        "GatewayType": "Ethernet Gateway",
        "Heartbeat": 5,
        "LastCommunicationDate": "",
        "MAC_Address": "70B3D502EA1E",
        "NetworkID": 34385,
        "NetworkUUID": "db3d6df8-0895-e6d3-8767-a31c08ae278b",
        "SignalStrength": ""
      },
      {
        "BatteryLevel": 101,
        "ClientName": "ingram",
        "ConfiguredSensors": 6,
        "GatewayID": 913526,
        "GatewayName": "CGW3 3g North America - 913526",
        "GatewayType": "",
        "Heartbeat": 5,
        "LastCommunicationDate": 1537269457000,
        "MAC_Address": "",
        "NetworkID": 34385,
        "NetworkUUID": "db3d6df8-0895-e6d3-8767-a31c08ae278b",
        "SignalStrength": 16
      }
    ]
  },
  "success": true
}
3.SensorList API
URL: https://ingrammicro.clearblade.com/api/v/1/code/bacb8fb60bb4d7c2c2b1c0e4bb9701/SensorList
Headers: 
{ "ClearBlade-UserToken":"Response 'user-token' from 'ClearBlade User Token API' which specified above"}
//
 {"ClearBlade-UserToken":"Given Usertoken" }
Method: Post
Body: 
  
                  { 
                  "networkUUID": "Given networkUUID"
                  }
SampleResponse: 
   {
